credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 38 x 14 cm (14 15/16 x 5 1/2 in.)
title: Fragment
description: Black cotton warp with weft of black cotton paired with hand-spun, slubby white cotton.  The varied thickness of the white yarn and its manipulation in relation to the black yarn in each shed gives the appearance of eccentric weft.
name: Fragment
